SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddEvent
AddEvent Activity class handles the UI and logic for adding or editing an event.
AdminEventScreen
Activity for managing events in the admin interface.
AdminFacilityArrayAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying facilities in a ListView with details such as name, ID, and address.
AdminFacilityScreen
AdminFacilityScreen is an Activity class that allows an administrator to manage facilities in the system.
AdminMainscreen
AdminMainscreen class provides the main interface for the admin user.
AdminProfileScreen
AdminProfileScreen allows administrators to browse user profiles and view details of each user.
AdminUserArrayAdapter
AdminUserArrayAdapter is an adapter for displaying user profiles in a ListView.
CancelledEntrantAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of cancelled entrants in a RecyclerView.
CancelledEntrantAdapterTest
 
CancelledEntrantsActivity
CancelledEntrantsActivity displays a list of users who have been cancelled from an event.
CreateFacilityActivity
CreateFacilityActivity allows the user to create a new facility by entering its name and address.
CustomScannerActivity
CustomScannerActivity provides a custom QR code scanner interface.
EditFacilityActivity
EditFacilityActivity allows the user to edit the details of an existing facility.
EditProfileActivity
EditProfileActivity allows the user to edit their profile information, including first name, last name, email, contact info, device info, and avatar.
Entrant
Represents an entrant with personal and location information.
EntrantActivity
EntrantActivity displays a list of events that the current user has joined (based on their user ID).
EntrantAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of entrants in a RecyclerView.
EntrantAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface for handling item click events in the RecyclerView.
EntrantAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder for displaying Entrant details in a RecyclerView.
EntrantAdapterTest
 
EntrantTest
 
Event
Represents an event with various details such as name, location, time, price, and more.
EventAdapter
Custom adapter for displaying event details in a ListView.
EventAdapterTest
 
EventInfoActivity
EventInfoActivity is the screen that displays detailed information about a specific event.
EventListAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of events in a ListView.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleTest
 
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
Facility
Represents a facility in the system.
FacilityAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of facilities in a RecyclerView.
FacilityAdapter.FacilityViewHolder
ViewHolder class for binding facility details to the item view.
FacilityAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface for handling item click events.
FacilityAdapterTest
 
FacilityTest
 
FinalEntrantAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of final entrants in a RecyclerView.
FinalEntrantAdapterTest
 
FinalEntrantsActivity
Activity class for displaying the final entrants for a specific event.
ImageListAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying events in a ListView with images.
LocationActivity
LocationActivity displays the location of event entrants on a Google Map and in a RecyclerView.
LocationAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of users (entrants) at a specific location.
LocationAdapterTest
 
MainActivity
MainActivity is the entry point of the application, where the user can select their role (Entrant, Organizer, Admin).
ManageEventsActivity
Activity that allows the user to manage events they have selected or are on a waitlist for.
MyFacilityActivity
MyFacilityActivity displays a list of facilities created by the current organizer.
MyFirebaseMessagingService
MyFirebaseMessagingService is a Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) service that handles incoming FCM messages and token management.
NotificationActionReceiver
NotificationActionReceiver is a BroadcastReceiver that handles user actions from notifications, such as accepting, declining, staying on, or leaving a waiting list.
NotificationAdapter
NotificationAdapter is a custom RecyclerView.Adapter used to display a list of notifications in a RecyclerView.
NotificationAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class that represents each item view for a notification.
NotificationAdapterTest
 
NotificationDetailActivity
NotificationDetailActivity displays detailed information about a specific notification.
NotificationModel
NotificationModel represents a model for notifications in the Vortex app.
NotificationModelTest
 
NotificationsActivity
NotificationsActivity displays a list of notifications for the user.
OrganizerActivity
Activity that allows the organizer to manage events, navigate to other parts of the app, and handle facilities associated with the organizer.
OrganizerInfo
The OrganizerInfo activity is responsible for displaying detailed information about a specific event.
OrganizerMenu
OrganizerMenu class handles the main activity for event organizers.
OrgCreateNotificationActivity
OrgCreateNotificationActivity allows the event organizer to create and send notifications.
OrgNotification
Represents a notification for an organizer in the system.
OrgNotificationAdapter
OrgNotificationAdapter is a custom adapter for displaying a list of organization notifications.
OrgNotificationAdapterTest
 
OrgNotificationDetailsActivity
OrgNotificationDetailsActivity displays the details of a specific notification.
OrgNotificationsActivity
OrgNotificationsActivity is responsible for displaying a list of notifications related to a specific event.
OrgNotificationTest
 
OrgQRCodeActivity
OrgQRCodeActivity is responsible for generating and displaying a QR code based on the event ID passed from the previous activity.
OrgSelectedEntrantsActivity
Activity class for displaying the selected, final, and canceled entrants for an event.
OrgWaitingListActivity
OrgWaitingListActivity displays the list of users who are on the waiting list for a particular event.
OrgWaitingListAdapter
OrgWaitingListAdapter is a custom adapter used to display a list of users waiting for a particular event or organization.
OrgWaitingListAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class that represents each item view for a user in the waiting list.
OrgWaitingListAdapterTest
 
ProfileActivity
ProfileActivity displays the user's profile information.
QrScannerActivity
QrScannerActivity is responsible for scanning QR codes using the device's camera.
SelectedEntrantAdapter
SelectedEntrantAdapter is a custom adapter used to display a list of selected entrants in a RecyclerView.
SelectedEntrantAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class that represents each item view for an entrant.
SelectedEntrantAdapterTest
Unit test for SelectedEntrantAdapter to verify item count, view creation, and data binding.
User
User class to represent a user profile or entrant.
UserDetailActivity
UserDetailActivity displays detailed information about a selected user and provides an option to delete the user.
UserRepository
UserRepository handles all user-related data operations, including retrieving, saving, and updating user data in Firestore, as well as uploading and deleting avatar images in Firebase Storage.
UserRepository.OnAvatarDeletedCallback
Callback interface for when an avatar image is deleted from Firebase Storage.
UserRepository.OnAvatarUploadedCallback
Callback interface for when an avatar image is uploaded to Firebase Storage.
UserRepository.OnUserLoadedCallback
Callback interface for when a user is loaded from Firestore.
UserRepository.OnUserSavedCallback
Callback interface for when a user is saved to Firestore.
UserTest
 
UserTokenManager
UserTokenManager handles the management of the Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) token and user ID.
